summary: There is a f*cking snake wearing a boot - There is a snake in my boot. Yes, you read that ​right. And honestly, nothing else needs to be said. You can ​see with your own two eyes that this snake is absolutely ​killing the red boot look, strutting—or, well, slithering—​around like it owns the place. The boldness, the sheer ​confidence, it’s all there. And let’s be real, that boot looks ​like it was made for this snake.
